rebirthUnlock: Yeniden Doğuş'un kilidini açtınız!. Bu özel Pazaryeri öğesi yeni bir oyuna 1. seviyeden başlamanıza izin verirken, görevlerinizi, ilerlemenizi, hayvanlarınızı vs korumanızı sağlar. HabitRPG'ye yeni bir hayat soluğu getirmek için, eğer ne var ne yok herşeyi elde ettiğinizi düşünüyorsanız, veya yeni özellikleri taze bir bakışla başlangıç seviyesindeki karakterin gözüyle deneyimlemek isterseniz kullanabilirsiniz.
rebirthStartOver: Rebirth starts your character over from Level 1, as if you had created a new account.
rebirthAdvList2: You have no Experience, Gold, or equipment.
rebirthAdvList3: Your Habits, Dailies, and To-Dos reset to yellow, and streaks reset.
rebirthAdvList4: You have the starting class of Warrior until you earn a new class.
rebirthInherit: Your new character inherits a few things from their predecessor:
rebirthInList1: Görevler, geçmiş ve ayarlar aynı kalır.
rebirthInList2: Challenge, Guild, and Party memberships remain.
rebirthInList3: Gems, backer tiers, and contributor levels remain.
rebirthInList4: Items obtained from Gems or drops (such as pets and mounts) remain, though you cannot access them until you unlock them again.
rebirthInList5: Limited edition equipment you've purchased can be repurchased, even if its event has ended.
rebirthEarnAchievement: You also earn an Achievement for beginning a new adventure!
rebirthAchievement: You've begun a new adventure! This is Rebirth <%= number %> for you, and the highest Level you've attained is <%= level %>. To stack this Achievement, begin your next new adventure when you've reached an even higher Level!
rebirthOrb: Used an Orb of Rebirth to start over after attaining Level
rebirthPop: Begin a new character at Level 1 while retaining achievements, collectibles, and tasks with history.
intro100: Now that you've hit level 100, you have the option to use the Orb of Rebirth for free at any time.
followup100: While you can continue to level up, it will no long boost your stats and no more content will unlock, to keep Habit fun for folks of all play styles.
rebirth100Info: If you're ready to start a new adventure, you can Rebirth now... or see how much further you can push yourself.
